summary: Toulouse is France's fourth-largest city, located in the southwest. It's a major hub for the aerospace industry, home to companies like Airbus and the European Space Agency's largest center. The city has a rich history, dating back to Roman times, and was once the capital of the Visigothic Kingdom. Known for its pink terracotta buildings, Toulouse is nicknamed "La Ville Rose" (The Pink City). It's also a top French city for students, with ancient universities and top engineering schools.
title: Toulouse
